channel.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/pistol69/unorthodox
New track from me, loads of chopped up breaks and glitchy samples mixed with a deep bassline.
172bpm yet different from your generic dnb (hence the track title), I haven’t produced anything for ages but managed to find the inspiration to produce this.
Let me know what you think guys.

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Thanks man, it did take me ages to chop loops up and reorder individual hits but was well worth it I think, thanks for the feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
Excellent track. glitch is a compulsive time consuming nightmare but you seem to power through easily and make it flow smoothly.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Auxy only man, I used a lot of samples from various sample packs but the bass, riser etc was made with Auxy instruments.

Read full topic

item.description:
Did you use any other softs than Auxy?

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Thanks, yes the bass was all made in Auxy.

It’s made up of Dirt, Lake and Beam with various filters and EQ.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: Bazooka
item.description:
Nice Track man. Mclovin those basslines. All Auxy?

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Marka is a sick tune, what I struggle with is making something really minimal that sounds good, I guess I need to work more on EQ.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Y E S
I have a particular love for “Marka”. I’ve jammed that track like a billion times over the years. He created such a genuinely unsettling vibe with what feels like such a minimal approach. I absolutely love it.

Stinking of Issey Miyake, dark rum and the marijuana
Step inna mi lake and swim with the piranha

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Dub Phizix is a legend, doesn’t conform to generic dnb which is also what I like to do. I always look for inspiration from his tracks.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Cheers man I’ll check these out, I’m sure they will be used in future projects.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
I LOVE DUB PHIZIX. I can definitely hear some inspiration from the ones you’ve mentioned, for sure.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Thanks for the honest feedback man, I’ll keep this in mind with future projects.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Thanks man, I was trying to get the balance of dark and experimental dnb as that’s what I’m currently into. I’m listening to a lot of Dub Phizix, Alix Perez, Sam Binga (if you haven’t listened to any of these check them out). I wanted something glitchy but also with a bit of a deep moody bass line which hopefully I’ve achieved.

Thanks again for your kind words.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
oh if ur looking for more weird/unique samples, Glitchmachines has a couple of free sample packs you can download. A TON of glitchy, futuristic/sci-fi sounds. idk if they’d totally be what you’re looking for, but i find them to be really neat for interesting fills or in between sounds

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Sine the Auxy update and purchasing more effect apps I’ve been trying to make samples even more unique. I often find myself spending hours trying to find samples that work in my track through trial and error.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
Pistol is massive. Wicked. Wicked.

Great tune mate.

My only critique would be that I thought some of the secondary percussion elements were a little too forward in the mix.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
As always, another absolute beauty of a track from you! Your production is so crisp and clean, and you are truly the DnB hero of Auxy. Chops are on point and the best is DIVINE. This thing is neuro af, but also carries something so visceral with it. Excellent work!

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Happy accidents are the best that’s why lately I’ve been using a lot of generative stuff in what I do

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]

item.description:
From a return, I would say you did a pretty good job. I’m looking forward to what you can make in Auxy 6!

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Percussion is completely off the chain. Love the rolling bass.

Not much else to add really it’s so smooth, sample selection is great, I love the vocally one. That little spinback effect is subtle but adds much. Good tension. Awesome!!

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: PISTOL
item.description:
Thanks man I appreciate the awesome feedback, I only release what I’m 100% happy with. I’ll keep trying to be unique lol.

Read full topic

item.title: PISTOL - Unorthodox [Dnb]
item.dc:creator: Twizard
item.description:
Always love to listen to your new songs, you’re probably the best dnb producer and most underrated producer in auxy. I really like the drums. Your style is different from the rest and I really, really like it.

Read full topic
